title: LeBron Goes Down, Packers looking for a coach, Durant chasing money, and Gottlieb’s Herd Hierarchy
itunes:title: LeBron Goes Down, Packers looking for a coach, Durant chasing money, and Gottlieb’s Herd Hierarchy
description:
Doug Gottlieb--in for Colin--likens Los Angeles Lakers forward LeBron James to a well-made car. He’s been playing for so long at such a high level without sustaining serious injury but he is getting older. Also, there's a familiar face in Green Bay and we're pretty sure Packers quarterback Aaron Rodgers wants him to be the head coach. Plus, Doug takes a shot his own version of the Herd Hierarchy. Finally, Doug makes his case for the 2018 NFL MVP. Guests include: Comedian Michael Rapaport, NFL analyst T. J. Houshmandzadeh and NBA commentator Jim Jackson.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
